data.name: Phantom Rose
data.detailed_description:
Phantom Rose is a roguelike deckbuilding card game. Fight and collect powerful cards as Reina, a maid exploring a mansion ravaged by evil creatures.

◆ A Roguelike Card Adventure

Build your card deck and make careful decisions while you explore as each death may be permanent.

◆ Manage Your Deck

There's no luck-based card draw during battle. Instead, manage your card's cooldown to defeat your foe swiftly and efficiently.

◆ Defeat and Collect

Collect over 100+ cards and powerful items by defeating phantoms & rescuing other maids in distress

◆ Explore Through Dangers

Venture through areas of interest, danger, and place of safety to reach and defeat the crown phantoms for large rewards

data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated or integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280 x 720 resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.10
  • Processor: 2GHz 64-bit Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated or integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280 x 720 resolution

Recommended:
